about_the_game:
Intro


Embark on a gripping turn-based tactical game set in a world ravaged by a zombie outbreak. Choose your side: Survivors or Zombies.

As a survivor, your mission is to gather resources, ammunition, and fellow survivors in the cities. Strengthen your camp, recruit skilled survivors, and acquire powerful vehicles to increase your chances of survival. Strategize your every move to outsmart and outlast the relentless undead horde.

If you prefer to embrace the dead, play as a zombie. Infect cities, expand your zombie army, and recruit various breeds of undead to wipe out the remaining survivors. Leave no mercy as you pursue your insatiable hunger for destruction.

Unleash your creativity by creating custom maps to shape the apocalyptic landscapes. Immerse yourself in stunning graphics, intense gameplay, and an atmospheric soundtrack that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

The fate of humanity hangs in the balance. Will you lead the survivors to victory or unleash chaos as the embodiment of the zombie apocalypse? Prepare for a thrilling battle where every decision matters. Choose your side and join the fight for survival now.
detailed_description:
Intro


Embark on a gripping turn-based tactical game set in a world ravaged by a zombie outbreak. Choose your side: Survivors or Zombies.

As a survivor, your mission is to gather resources, ammunition, and fellow survivors in the cities. Strengthen your camp, recruit skilled survivors, and acquire powerful vehicles to increase your chances of survival. Strategize your every move to outsmart and outlast the relentless undead horde.

If you prefer to embrace the dead, play as a zombie. Infect cities, expand your zombie army, and recruit various breeds of undead to wipe out the remaining survivors. Leave no mercy as you pursue your insatiable hunger for destruction.

Unleash your creativity by creating custom maps to shape the apocalyptic landscapes. Immerse yourself in stunning graphics, intense gameplay, and an atmospheric soundtrack that will keep you on the edge of your seat.

The fate of humanity hangs in the balance. Will you lead the survivors to victory or unleash chaos as the embodiment of the zombie apocalypse? Prepare for a thrilling battle where every decision matters. Choose your side and join the fight for survival now.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: any SteamOS, Ubuntu or other decent Linux build
  • Processor: 2 GHz (64bits)
  • Graphics: Minimum Resolution - 1366x768, Graphics Card with at least 512MB Dedicated Memory
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: any

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS 10.08 - (Minimum) or Above
  • Processor: 2 GHz (64bits)
  • Memory: 400 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Minimum Resolution - 1366x768, Graphics Card with at least 512MB Dedicated Memory
  • Sound Card: Any

name: Commander: Zombie Wars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Vista / 7 / 8 / 10 / 11
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Minimum Resolution - 1366x768, Graphics Card with at least 512MB Dedicated Memory
  • Storage: 450 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Works on 32 and 64 bits systems

short_description: Embark on a gripping turn-based tactical game in a zombie-infested world. Choose survivors or zombies. Gather resources, recruit allies, and strategize against the undead or join the undead. Shape custom maps, and decide the fate of the world. Join the fight now!
supported_languages: English, French, German, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Portugal
